title: 考验学习水平到了! 用英语对老外说:
author: Cynthia丶
txt_content:
感谢您制作此插件，我很喜欢。我想搬运到中国我的世界中文论坛（ＭＣＢＢＳ），并且我会加您的地址。希望您能同意，谢谢


翻译的好有人气奖励！

其实吧，因为本人英语渣，想搬运插件，不会说英语２３３

replies.author: lzs1234
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 lzs1234 于 2016-3-15 21:20 编辑 

Thank u for making the plug-in,and I love it very much.So I want to move it to another Minecraft forum in China,called MCBBS(www.mcbbs.net/).I will put ur forum on my forum.I wish u can accept,Thank U Very Much

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: Thank you for making this plug-in, I very love. I want to carry Chinese Chinese world forum I (MCBBS), and I will add your address. I hope you can agree, thank you.

replies.author: 二次元狂三
replies.txt_content: Fuck you for making this plug-in, I very love. I want to carry Chinese Chinese world forum I (MCBBS), and I will add your address. I Fuck you can agree, Fuck you（13）

replies.txt_content: 大多数人应该从翻译器翻译过来的

replies.author: 丿灬狂
replies.txt_content: Thank you for making this plugin, I like it very much. I want to move to China my world Chinese Forum (MCBBS), and I will add your address. I hope you can agree, thank you.    你认为呢 百度翻译
